topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## GitHub Issue Tracker

Create and manage GitHub issues directly from Clubhouse. Supports issue templates, validated label selection, inline editing, and assigning issues to AI agents.

Requires the **`gh` CLI** installed and authenticated (`gh auth login`) with a GitHub remote configured.

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Browse & Filter** — Issues listed by most recently updated (30 per page). Toggle between Open/Closed, search by title or number, and paginate with Load More.

**Detail View** — Full issue details with metadata, body, comments, and inline commenting. Toggle state (open/close) directly from the detail view.

**Create Issues** — Click **+ New** or use the command palette. Supports `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` templates that pre-fill title, body, and labels. Labels are validated against your repo's actual labels.

**Edit Inline** — Modify title, body, and labels from the detail view. Label changes apply as add/remove diffs to avoid clearing existing labels.

**Agent Assignment** — Assign an issue to a durable agent with optional custom instructions. Save default instructions for reuse across sessions.

**Settings** — Override the auto-detected repository with a custom `owner/repo` value.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Refresh Issues** | Reloads the issue list from GitHub |
| **Create Issue** | Opens the issue creation form |
| **Assign Issue to Agent** | Opens the agent assignment dialog for the selected issue |
| **Close/Reopen Issue** | Toggles the state of the selected issue |
| **View Issue in Browser** | Opens the selected issue on GitHub |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log diagnostic information for troubleshooting |
| **storage** | Cache issue data and persist agent instructions |
| **notifications** | Show success/error notifications after operations |
| **files** | Read `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` files for template support |
| **agents** | List and assign durable agents to issues |
| **commands** | Register command palette entries |
| **process** | Execute the `gh` CLI to interact with GitHub |
| **git** | Detect the repository remote for the current project |
| **widgets** | Render UI components |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
